entries.title: Kim Porter's father breaks silence and issues forewarning to Diddy amid rumors about his daughter's death and music mogul
entries.summary: Kim Porter's father, Jake Porter, 78, spoke to DailyMail.com from his home in Georgia, amid swirling rumors about his daughter's death and her relationship with Sean 'Diddy' Combs.

entries.title: Suge Knight Claims THESE Music Execs Used Sex & Drugs To ‘Control’ Diddy -- Who In Turn Did The Same To Usher & Justin Bieber!
entries.summary:
Suge Knight is making some bombshell allegations after Diddy’s sex trafficking and racketeering arrest. In a phone interview with NewsNation host Chris Cuomo on Tuesday, the 58-year-old record executive — who is currently behind bars himself, for voluntary manslaughter — claimed the rapper, and other artists like Justin Bieber and Usher, were victims of abuse [...]

entries.title: Kate Middleton's brother James gives a health update on the Princess of Wales after she finishes chemotherapy
entries.summary: The father-of-one, 37, sat for an interview with American daytime show USA Today to discuss his new book, Meet Ella, and gave an update on his sister's health.

entries.title: Lance Bass Confesses He 'Never Really Liked' Diddy
entries.summary: The former *NSYNC member said the revelation occurred after he overheard a conversation between the rapper and Justin Timberlake.
